name: Artifact Series: From Memory by Marvin Grey

metadata.name: Artifact #194: Grandeur I
metadata.description:
Located at Marina Bay Sands, in Singapore, the Louis Vuitton store at is a unique piece of architecture. The  "Island Maison" is housed in one of the “Crystal Pavilions” of the mixed-use complex designed by Moshe Safdie.

The Story: 
A decade ago, I moved to Singapore to pursue a life-changing career move that determined the next couple of years in my life. The whole experience was jarring and difficult; but along the challenges come life lessons that led me to where I am today.

The Series:
"From Memory" is a collection of photos that capture some of the places I visited and how they are seen in my mind: the visual allure, the melancholic color grading, coupled with the emotions, experience and the feeling that they evoke.

Image Information:
Size: 6663x4997 pixels
Camera: Sony A7R II
Lens: Laowa 15mm f2 Zero-D
Shutter: 223 seconds
Aperture: f8
ISO: 50

Location: Marina Bay Sands, Singapore
